LanguageData.VME_Firefighting_Abhorrent.label: odrażające
LanguageData.VME_Firefighting_Abhorrent.description: To quash a sacred flame is to commit an unspeakable sin.
LanguageData.VME_Firefighting_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.VME_Firefighting_Preferred.description: There is nothing more exhilarating than extinguishing a dangerous fire.
